sentences.en: A great virologist declared that the virus is nonliving , do you believe?
sentences.cn: 非常有名的病毒学家曾断言病毒是死物, 你相信 吗 ?

sentences.en: Abiotic environment The nonliving factors of the environment that influence ecological systems.
sentences.cn: 影响生态系统的非生物环境因子.

sentences.en: Air, water and soil are nonliving things.
sentences.cn: 空气, 水和土壤是非事物.

sentences.en: But bully life reaches deeper and ties up the entire planet in the web of its network, also roping in the nonliving matrix of rock and gas into its coevolutionary antics.
sentences.cn: 然而强悍的生命向更深处扎根，不但用它的网络将整个地球包裹起来，而且将没有生命的岩石和大气也串连进它的共同进化的怪诞行动之中。

sentences.en: He could still recognize nonliving objects, like a flashlight, a compass, a kettle or a canoe.
sentences.cn: 他可以分辨非生命体，例如：闪光灯、指南针、水壶或者小船。

sentences.en: In 1860 Louis Pasteur performed experiments that eventually disproved “spontaneous generation, ” the idea that life continually arose from nonliving things.
sentences.cn: 1860年，路易斯巴斯德做了个实验，最终反驳了“自然发生说”，这一说认为生命源源不断于无生命的物体。

sentences.en: Living matter lives surrounded by, and ceaselessly interacts with, its nonliving environment.
sentences.cn: 生活物质生活在它周围的无生命环境中, 并与之不停地相互作用.
其他的事物是无生命的.

sentences.en: Others change into nonliving parts of the hair and nails.
sentences.cn: 其它细胞变成毛发,指甲等无生命部分.

sentences.en: The debate whether a virus is living or nonliving leads nowhere.
sentences.cn: 争论病毒是生物体还是非生物体是徒劳无益的.

sentences.en: The longevity of nonliving complexity isn't even in the same league as the persistence of life.
sentences.cn: 非生命复杂体的寿命比之生命的执著,简直不能相提并论.

sentences.en: The nonliving material upon which an organism lives or grows.
sentences.cn: 培养基:能够使有机体存活或生长在其上的非生命物质.

sentences.en: This remarkable ability is the basis of all the other differences that distinguish the living nonliving.
sentences.cn: 这一非凡的能力是区分生物和非生物的各种差别的基础.
